DOC.criteria: Age range : 18 65 year old Subjects constant intermittent nonspecific lower back pain minimum three ( 3 ) month duration . Prospective subject diagnosis follow potential underlying cause low back pain : ankylosing spondylitis , cancer history histologically demonstrate malignant carcinoma , cauda equine syndrome , herniated disc , spinal fracture , spinal osteomyelitis .
